review: The best Airbnb stay hands down. I rented this as a 4 day Thanksgiving retreat for me and my family after not seeing each other for a decade because of family drama. I thought this was the perfect choice because of all the fun family activities that would allow people to play and be together but at the same time, have choices and be spread out (key if your family is prone to family fighting). There was a massage chair room, a pool, sauna, jacuzzi, work out area, grill area, an arcade room with lots of game choices, and multiple TVs which was great for setting up the sports room, the Nintendo switch game room, and movie room for the kiddos. There was also so many beds and places for everyone to sleep. It was the best time and money spent. I hope to be back!!!

Great home to stay at ! Felt just like home! Had everything you need! They put in all the little details that matter ! Very clean and cozy ! Kids loved the game room ! Adults loved the massage chairs ! Highly recommend! Tons of space for family and lots of parking spaces! Not one single complaint I can honestly say !! We enjoyed our thanksgiving here with our family and felt just like we were home ! We will definitely be back again! Thanks for everything!

Great spot! Our kids had a blast with all the goodies in the garage. The golf bay and bubble hockey were favorites. There is an Infinity game table in the living room and the massage chairs in a separate room were a hit as well. Lots of thoughtful touches throughout the house. Hot tub is great and Philip was quick to respond. Highly recommended. Grocery and restaurant options nearby if you venture out. Great place for kids.
Wow completely blown away by this rental! Game room was tons of fun, massage chairs were a great way to end the day. The beds were super comfortable will definitely be returning!

A wonderful place to stay! A wonderful host! The arcade was a joy for the children, even those children over 40! Plenty of fun to be had at the house, but close to groceries and a mall and forest preserves and so much more. Highly recommend!!!
Clean and as described. Host was very polite amd friendly. We had a great time staying at this proprty. highly recommended
We had a great at Phillipâ€™s place. Everything was clean, pool was great, arcade was awesome !

Thank you, again! We will seek out your properties for our future stays!

The Kelly Family

Place lived up to its reviews and photos!  Quick communications back on any issues or questions.  Loved the added touch of snacks, wine, and chocolate on the night stands as well as the 'spa' packets.  Great weekend get away with our family.  The game room and pool were a huge hit.
Appreciate the stay ! Thanks for everything
